Generation V.Black: The lower half of its body is wrapped in a cloud of energy. It zooms through the sky at 200 mph .
Generation V.White: Tornadus expels massive energy from its tail, causing severe storms. Its power is great enough to blow houses away.
Generation V.Black 2: In every direction it flies, creating winds so powerful, they blow everything away.
Generation V.White 2: In every direction it flies, creating winds so powerful, they blow everything away.

Generation VI.X: The lower half of its body is wrapped in a cloud of energy. It zooms through the sky at 200 mph .
Generation VI.Y: Tornadus expels massive energy from its tail, causing severe storms. Its power is great enough to blow houses away.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: The lower half of its body is wrapped in a cloud of energy. It zooms through the sky at 200 mph .
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: Tornadus expels massive energy from its tail, causing severe storms. Its power is great enough to blow houses away.

Generation VIII.Legends: Arceus: An example of what is known as a “form change,” though I suspect this strange avian guise to be Tornadus's true form. Tornadus has been sighted crossing the ocean while in this form.

Generation V.Black: Roaming Unova ( Only one ) ( Incarnate Forme )
Generation V.Black 2: Transfer from Dream Radar ( Therian Forme )
Generation V.White 2: Transfer from Dream Radar ( Therian Forme )

Generation VI.Omega Ruby: Soaring in the sky (requires having Castform in party) ( Only one ) ( Incarnate Forme )

Generation VII.Ultra Sun: Ultra Space Wilds ( Cliff World ) ( Only one ) ( Incarnate Forme )

Generation VIII.Sword Expansion Pass: Max Lair ( Dynamax Adventure ) ( Only one ) ( Incarnate Forme )
Generation VIII.Legends: Arceus: Alabaster Icelands : Bonechill Wastes Blizzard ( Only one ) ( Incarnate Forme )
